articles.title: Preparing for your second Expedition - ARC Raiders
articles.description: ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure, set in a lethal future earth, ravaged by a mysterious mechanized threat known as ARC.
articles.content:
Raiders!
It will soon be time to open up the tunnels out of Speranza and send our second wave of ambitious Raiders to new adventures beyond the Rust Belt. 
Raiders can sign up from February 25th an… [+3021 chars]

articles.title: Google teases AirDrop support for more Android phones, 'exciting' announcements 'very soon' - 9to5Google
articles.description: A Google VP is teasing that Android's Quick Share tool will be adding support for AirDrop on more phones in the not-too-distant future.
articles.content:
After launching on the Pixel 10 series last year, Google has teased that AirDrop support via Quick Share will be coming to more Android phones, with announcements coming “very soon.”
During a press … [+2240 chars]

articles.author: Rockstar Games
articles.title: Break Up Rival Couples in the New Deadline Duet Mode for Triple Rewards - Rockstar Games
articles.description: Spark explosive breakups in Deadline Duet, the new Adversary Mode that puts the “power up” in “power couple” as you and your partner use twin Shotaro beam trails to destroy opponents in pursuit of Triple Rewards for the next two weeks.
